name: LaiXi
label: One desktop, hundreds of phones, batch simplified!
maker_introduction:
@luobaishunThank you for the thoughtful question! Let me break this down in two parts:，1️⃣ Phone Farm core value scenario:
• E-commerce matrix operation - manage synchronous listing/promotion of 500+ store accounts (such as TikTok Shop batch operation)
• Mobile game studio - 200+ device automatic brush initial number + cross-region testing, improve game publishing ROI
• Social media growth - 100+ accounts automatically raise the number/interaction/Posting, avoiding the risk of single account limit on the platform
• Data acquisition - Diversified configuration of device fingerprint to achieve high-precision crawler anti-blocking (10 times more effective than pure IP proxy)
2️⃣ The essential difference between Laixi and cloud mobile:
▫️ Hybrid architecture benefits - support both physical device clusters (to ensure account authenticity) and access to cloud phones (through our AndroidBot protocol)
▫️ cost subversion - Managing the cost of 100 physical devices ≈20 cloud mobile phones (measured data)
▫️ Control granularity - cloud phone apis are typically limited, while Laixi supports ADB level depth manipulation  
Upvote
Report
Share
3m ago
description: LaiXi is designed for bulk device management of Android Phone Farms. Through LaiXi, you can control over 100 phones from a desktop, mirror screens, and automate tasks via scripts and mouse/keyboard input.
label_zh: 一台电脑，数百部手机，批量简化！
content_zh: LaiXi 是一款专为管理大量安卓手机设备设计的工具。通过 LaiXi，你可以从电脑上控制超过100部手机，进行屏幕镜像，并通过脚本和鼠标/键盘输入来自动化任务。

name: Scaloom
label: AI tool for high-conversion cold emails
maker_introduction:
Hey Product Hunt! 👋
I’m excited to share Scaloom with you! 🚀

Scaloom delivers ultra-personalized AI-driven website analyses, helping you craft compelling outreach that converts.

🔍 What Scaloom analyzes:
✅ SEO & Rankings – Identify optimization gaps & keyword opportunities
✅ Performance – Pinpoint speed issues affecting conversions
✅ Security & Trust – Detect vulnerabilities & SSL issues
✅ UX & Accessibility – Improve user experience for higher engagement

Would love to hear your thoughts & feedback! What’s your biggest struggle with cold emails? Let’s chat in the comments. 👇

name: WoolyAI Acceleration Service
label: GPU Service with GPU Core and Memory Resources Used billing
maker_introduction:
📌
Hi, We’re a small team of OS, virtualization, and ML engineers, and after three years of development, we’re thrilled to launch the beta of our CUDA abstraction layer! We decouple the Kernel Shader execution from applications that use CUDA into a Wooly Abstraction layer. In this abstraction layer, we compile these to a new binary, and Shaders are compiled into a Wooly Instruction Set. At runtime, Kernel Shader launch events initiate a transfer of Shader over the network from a CPU host to a GPU host, where they are recompiled. Their execution is managed by Wooly Server software to achieve maximum GPU resource utilization, isolation between workloads, and cross-compatibility with hardware vendors before being converted to be passed on to the respective GPU hardware runtime and drivers. In principle, the wooly abstraction layer is similar to an Operating System, which sits on top of the hardware and enables the most efficient and reliable execution of multiple workloads.
We built a GPU Cloud service(WoolyAi Acceleration Service) using this abstraction layer with "Actual GPU Resources Used" billing, NOT "GPU Time Used" billing.

Looking forward to getting your feedback and comments.
Upvote

description: WoolyAI is a CUDA Abstraction layer. On top of this layer, we have built a GPU Cloud service(WoolyAI Acceleration Service) with "Actual GPU Resources Used" billing, NOT "GPU Time Used" billing for Data Scientist to run Pytorch applications from CPU environment
label_zh: GPU 服务，按使用的 GPU 核心和内存资源计费
content_zh: WoolyAI 是一个 CUDA 抽象层。在这个层之上，我们构建了一个 GPU 云服务（WoolyAI Acceleration Service），按实际使用的 GPU 资源计费，而不是按 GPU 使用时间计费，方便数据科学家在 CPU 环境下运行 Pytorch 应用程序。

name: Magicam
label: Real time face swapping for any stream or meeting
maker_introduction:
📌
🚀 Magicam 2.0 is Here – Bigger, Better, and More Magical! 🚀

Hey PH community! 👋 Ethan here, and I couldn’t be more excited to share Magicam’s second launch with you all! Being back on Product Hunt feels like coming home, and we’re beyond grateful for the support and feedback that helped shape this new version.

For those new to Magicam, it’s an AI-powered face-swapping app that works in real-time—perfect for video calls, live streams, and more. Plus, it allows you to swap faces in pre-recorded videos with just one click! Whether for work, fun, or creative projects, Magicam brings a touch of AI magic to everyday life. ✨

What’s New in Magicam 2.0?
🔊 Voice Clone – Don’t just look like them—sound like them too! Upload a voice sample, and Magicam will transform your voice to match. Pair it with face swap for the ultimate transformation.
🖼️ LivePortrait – Ever wished a photo could come to life? Now it can. Upload any image—whether it’s a real person, a painting, or a 3D model—and bring it to life with your own movements.
🎬 Next-Level Video Face Swap – Upload a video, let Magicam detect faces, pick a new face, and swap instantly. No complex editing, just one-click magic.
🎛️ Advanced Customization Panel – We’ve kept our signature one-click seamless swaps, but now you get full control. Fine-tune the details to get the exact look you want.
🎭 More powerful real-time face swapping function – Through the upgrade of ai technology, the ability to swap faces in real-time scenarios such as meetings or live broadcasts has become more natural and smooth.

We built Magicam 2.0 to make AI creativity more fun, accessible, and powerful—whether you’re a creator, a tech enthusiast, or just someone who loves experimenting with AI.

💡 Special Launch Offer: From March 9 to March 16, use PHXMAGIC20 at checkout to get 20% off any paid plan!

We’d love to hear your thoughts! Drop a comment, test it out, and let us know what you think. Your feedback helps us improve and innovate! 🚀💜
Upvote

name: Aya Vision
label: Multilingual, Multimodal AI from Cohere
description: Aya Vision, from Cohere For AI, is the open-weights, multilingual, multimodal models (8B & 32B). Outperforms larger models on multilingual vision tasks. Available on Hugging Face and Kaggle.
label_zh: 多语言、多模态的Cohere人工智能
content_zh: Aya Vision 是 Cohere For AI 推出的一个开源权重、多语言、多模态模型（80 亿和 320 亿参数）。在多语言视觉任务上，它的表现优于许多更大的模型。你可以在 Hugging Face 和 Kaggle 上找到它。

name: Unreal Speech
label: Fast & Affordable Text-to-Speech API
maker_introduction:
📌
Hello builders! 👋

I created Unreal Speech after wanting to listen to blogs instead of reading them, but finding existing text-to-speech options both expensive and robotic-sounding.

When the open-source Kokoro model was released, we leveraged our infrastructure expertise to make it production-ready. The result? A high-quality voice API that's incredibly cost-effective for high-volume and long-form content.

Key benefits:
- 48 natural-sounding voices across 8 languages
- Ultra-fast 300ms streaming with word-level timestamps
- Generate up to 10 hours of audio in a single request
- Fraction of the cost compared to other TTS providers
- 250K characters free to get you started

If you're building applications that need voice capabilities but don't want the hassle of deploying and scaling models yourself, Unreal Speech is the solution you've been waiting for.

I'd love to hear what you're building and how we might help!

Thanks,
Eric
Upvote
(20)
Report
Share
14h ago
description: Cut text-to-speech costs. 11x cheaper than 11Labs. Production-ready. Stream audio + word-level timestamps. 300ms latency. Generate up to 10 hours of audio in one request. 48 voices, 8 languages. 250K chars free.
label_zh: 快速且经济实惠的文本转语音 API
content_zh: 降低文本转语音的成本。比11Labs便宜11倍。随时可用于生产。支持音频流和词级时间戳。延迟仅300毫秒。单次请求可生成长达10小时的音频。提供48种声音，支持8种语言。免费试用25万字符。

name: Streak Hunter
label: Never miss a day on product hunt
maker_introduction:
One of my biggest private pains was that I lost my PH streak twice last year. 😿

I did a little bit of research and didn't find a function built into PH to remind me of my streak.

At this moment, "STREAK HUNTER" came into the world! 🤩

I know this isn't the biggest pain for many of you guys, but some of you may feel what I say and need a daily reminder for the streak.

Now you have it, and the best part is - it's completely free and this forever. I don't want to charge anything for this. Maybe I'll advertise my own tools inside this tool one day, but STREAK HUNTER will never have a paid plan. I promise.

It's a nice lightweight solution, not many functions.

Please give me your feedback, guys. Only with your feedback can I make this product even better! 🐝
description: Set up personalized daily email reminders to ensure you never break your ProductHunt voting streak. Track your progress and stay motivated with StreakHunter.com.
label_zh:
Never miss a day on product hunt
绝不错过产品猎寻的每一天
content_zh: 设置个性化的每日电子邮件提醒，确保你不会中断在ProductHunt上的投票连续记录。通过StreakHunter.com跟踪你的进度并保持动力。
